links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
formula: Multiplicative with a(p^e) = (q-1)q^(e-1) where q = nextPrime(p).. - _David W. Wilson_, Sep 01, 2001
mathematica: b[1] = 1; b[p_?PrimeQ] := b[p] = Prime[ PrimePi[p] + 1]; b[n_] := b[n] = Times @@ (b[First[#]]^Last[#] &) /@ FactorInteger[n]; a[n_] := Sum[ MoebiusMu[n/d]*b[d], {d, Divisors[n]}]; Table[a[n], {n, 1, 70}]  (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Jul 18 2013 *)
author: _Marc LeBrun_
extensions: More terms from _David W. Wilson_, Aug 29 2001
